name: Pampas & Selene: The Maze of Demons
storyline: According to the legend, after defeating the Dark Cleric in the Castle Greek, Popolon, and Aphrodite became King and Queen. They ruled the realm with wisdom and prosperity, but after thirty-six years of peace, in the distant Mogdoss Castle, a new evil rises, one that echoes the shadow of what happened at Castle Greek all those years ago. Pampas and Selene, children of Popolon and Aphrodite, wield both sword and wand as they enter Mogdoss Castle to put an end to this terrible threat.
summary: Join Pampas and Selene as they overcome monsters, demons, and the Dark Priest with the help of the gods themselves! Explore this metroidvania 8-bit platformer alone or with a friend. This retro game is a loving tribute to an MSX2 masterpiece from the creator of UnEpic, Ghost 1.0, and UnMetal.
